p: The x variables or predictors for all models in Table 2 include respondent age (in years), gender (0 male, 1 female), education (–1 high school or less, 0 some college or technical school, 1 college graduate, 2 postgraduate) and political party (–1 Democrat, 0 Independent, 1 Republican). Under this coding, when education×party interaction terms are present the main effects of education represent its effects when party = 0 (Independents). Similarly the main effects of party represent its effects when education = 0 (some college or technical school).
